content.raw: You're right. I'll retarget. Hopefully this pull request will remind me not to change the location of a tag within an SDF version. I should have bumped the version and used the handy conversion feature, and it would have announced the deprecation instead of having a silent deprecation. Lesson learned. Thanks for all the reviews.

I should have bumped the version and used the handy conversion feature, and it would have announced the deprecation instead of having a silent deprecation. Lesson learned. Thanks for all the reviews.
